Name: Play a ball
About the game: Imitation of 'sugar bean man: the ultimate elimination' of the production of small games. The perspective of the game is the third person In the game, you will play a lovely and cheap ball to experience the stimulation of participating in variety show! Here comes a group of whimsical challenges and interesting obstacle races. How soon can you get to the finish line?
